content.title: Tax Optimization: Maximize Your Savings
bullets: Utilize Section 80C fully by investing ₹150,000 in ELSS, PPF, and NPS to save ₹7,500 in tax.
Invest ₹50,000 in NPS Tier-1 under Section 80CCD(1B) for an additional ₹2,500 tax saving.
Enhance health insurance coverage under Section 80D by ₹75,000 to save ₹3,750 in tax.
Capitalize on LTCG exemption by booking ₹125,000 in gains tax-free this year.
Total potential tax savings amount to ₹13,750 by optimizing deductions and capital gains.
Choose the Old Regime to maximize deductions if applicable, or focus on tax-efficient products under the New Regime.
paragraphs: To optimize your tax savings, it is crucial to fully utilize the available deductions under Sections 80C, 80CCD(1B), and 80D. By investing ₹150,000 in a mix of ELSS, PPF, and NPS, you can significantly reduce your taxable income and save ₹7,500 in taxes. Additionally, contributing ₹50,000 to NPS Tier-1 under Section 80CCD(1B) provides an extra ₹2,500 in tax savings, which is over and above the 80C limit.

For health-related deductions, consider topping up your health insurance by ₹75,000. This includes coverage for yourself, your family, and your senior citizen parents, allowing you to save ₹3,750 in taxes. Furthermore, take advantage of the LTCG exemption by booking up to ₹125,000 in gains tax-free. This strategy not only optimizes your current tax liabilities but also resets your investment cost base for future gains.

actions.action: Invest ₹50,000 in ELSS by December 31 to start the 3-year lock-in period and save ₹2,500 in taxes.
Contribute ₹50,000 to NPS Tier-1 for Section 80CCD(1B) benefits and save ₹2,500 in taxes.
Open or top-up a PPF account with ₹50,000 to ensure safe, tax-free returns.
Enhance your health insurance coverage by ₹75,000, including a super top-up policy for parents.
Review and redeem equity mutual funds to book ₹125,000 in LTCG tax-free.
